I often hear people saying that "the wine is not afraid of the alleys." Today, the pilgrimage Xunxia Hall perfectly explained this sentence.No one thought that a small tavern hidden in Jingmei alleys actually collected wines from different wineries in the world, with a number of 5,000 kinds.As soon as we entered the store, we were attracted by a variety of Tibetan wine lives, which made our group of alcohol's lovers emotional and could not help themselves for a long time.
The main purpose of the visit today is that the sister at the meeting could not stand everyone on weekdays and always used wine to cherish the local toasts when they dinner. It spoiled the treasures she arranged.
After everyone was in a greetings for a while, the manager immediately brought the wine, cheese, TAPAS and other wines and five carefully selected wines to interpret a page of briefings to bring everyone from grape varieties, plants, origin, and The process is to buy, taste and save, and enter the world of wine.In just two hours, we traveled in the old and new regions, feeling the persistence of traditional wineries and the unrestrained natural wine. Various wine glasses of different shapes combined the tannins and taste buds of wine.
Friends, friends, staggered, happy life, but only.
Teacher Vincent introduced Shirley, who usually did not have any contact. Ban Niang prepared a lot of food that matched it. It was a wonderful night.
